concept.title: Creating a Checksum
concept.shortdesc: Create a checksum using the Livefyre libraries.

section.title: Java
NodeJS
Python
section.codeblock:
from livefyre import Livefyre
network = Livefyre.get_network('networkName', 'networkKey') site = network.get_site('siteId', 'siteKey') collection = site.build_comments_collection('title', 'articleId', 'http://www.example.com') collection.data.tags = 'tags'
collection_meta_token = collection.build_collection_meta_token()

section.title: Ruby
section.codeblock:
require 'livefyre'
network = Livefyre.get_network('networkName', 'networkKey') site = network.get_site('siteId', 'siteKey') collection = site.build_comments_collection('title', 'articleId', 'http://www.example.com') collection.data.tags = 'tags'
collection_meta_token = collection.build_collection_meta_token
